original_text: Israel's people refuse to obey me. Say to them, “This is what the Almighty Lord says: Israel's people, you have done too many disgusting things!
korean_text: 너는 반역하는 자 곧 이스라엘 족속에게 이르기를 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하시기를 이스라엘 족속아 너희의 모든 가증한 일이 족하니라

sentences.original_text: Israel's people refuse to obey me.
This is what the Almighty Lord says:
you have done too many disgusting things!
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 너무나 역겨운 행위를 많이 저질렀다!
